NC.Q: Which is smaller, the value of Onboarding, Workplace Wellbeing, or Health & Safety?
NC.A: The value of {Health & Safety} is smaller.

MSR.Q: Which hierarchical path in the sunburst chart makes the largest contribution to the total?
